snippet.title: One Minute of Mayhem from Blade Strangers (Switch/PS4/Steam)
snippet.description:
Got a minute? Check out 60 glorious seconds of crushing combos, counters and special attacks from Blade Strangers, the action-packed new one-on-one fighting game from Nicalis, coming to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 and Steam in the summer of 2018.

Developed in Japan by Studio Saizensen, Blade Strangers is an arcade-style brawler with intuitive controls, stunning character animation and a diverse roster of playable characters from Cave Story+, Code of Princess EX and Umihara Kawase, among other surprise entrants. 

Please visit our blog for up-to-the-minute information on Blade Strangers and all the other exciting Nicalis games that are coming your way! https://blog.nicalis.com/
